trans-unit.source: Specifies constants that indicate how the entity body of an HTTP request has been read.
trans-unit.target: 指定表示如何會讀取 HTTP 要求實體主體的常數。

trans-unit.source: The entity body has been read into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實體內容讀入<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream*>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream*> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The entity body has been read into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實體內容讀入<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream*>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream*> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The entity body has already been read and its contents have been put into HTTP request collections like <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form*>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Files*>, <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream*>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.BinaryRead*>.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取實體內容和其內容已放置類似的 HTTP 要求集合<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Classic mode applies when ASP.NET pipeline processing has already occurred.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 管線處理已經進行，適用於傳統模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, running an ASP.NET page or accessing a property in one of the HTTP request collections causes the entity body to be read, and the entity body contents are then put into the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，執行 ASP.NET 網頁或存取屬性其中一種 HTTP 要求的集合會導致實體讀取，並實體本文的內容會接著放入適當的集合。

trans-unit.source: The entity body has not been read.
